features: 500-milliliters of Listerine Clinical Solutions Teeth Strength Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash in a refreshing Alpine Mint flavor to repair tooth enamel, strengthen teeth & help prevent tooth decay

The fluoride mouthwash for adults repairs tooth enamel now for 24-hour cavity protection AND 3x stronger* & longer lasting teeth making it a great addition to your twice daily oral care routine *with brushing in a lab study

This mint mouthwash is powered by sodium fluoride and helps prevent tooth decay while helping to strengthen teeth. This mouthwash works below the tooth surface for 24-hour cavity protection** **when used twice daily

Adults & children 12 & older, use this oral rinse twice daily after brushing with toothpaste. Vigorously swish 10 mL of rinse between teeth for one minute & spit out. Do not swallow. Do not or eat or drink for 30 minutes after rinsing
Tested by dentists & hygienists, this ADA-Accepted mouth rinse from Listerine aids in the prevention of dental cavities while strengthening teeth & providing fresh breath for a refreshing mouth feel
body.description: Help strengthen teeth, fight cavities, & freshen breath in one step with Listerine Clinical Solutions Teeth Strength Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash! This refreshing alpine mint-flavored fluoride mouthwash from Listerine, an ADA-Accepted mouthwash, is formulated with sodium fluoride to strengthen teeth and help prevent tooth decay. The oral rinse repairs tooth enamel now to prevent cavities & provide 3x stronger* & longer lasting teeth. Tested by dentists & dental hygienists, this mouthwash works below the tooth surface for 24-hour cavity protection** to improve & support your overall oral health. Adults & children 12 & older, use this mint oral rinse twice daily after brushing with toothpaste. Vigorously swish 10 mL of fluoride mouth rinse between teeth for one minute & then spit out; do not swallow the fluoride mouthwash. For best results, avoid eating or drinking for 30 minutes after rinsing. *with brushing in a lab study **when used twice daily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No surprises here
reviews.reviewText: Does exactly what I expect it to. Helps freshen breath and keep my teeth clean. I use it after I brush in the morning and at night and it seems to help with cleaner teeth (less weird film on my teeth) and bad breath. I don't think this is necessary if you have good flossing and brushing habits though, but I do like the minty burn you get when you swish it around for a minute or so.Might also be a good option if you primarily use fluoride-free toothpaste but still want to apply some fluoride here and there, maybe a bit less regularly (I don't have that problem as I use this on top of fluoride toothpaste).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and keeps your teeth feeling great too
reviews.reviewText: I like this mouthwash versus the standard listerine that I've used in the past. This one doesn't seem to have as much painful burning feeling when you use it. I also like that it has flouride as well to help your teeth. The alpine mint flavor isn't harsh and leaves your mouth feeling fresh. You get roughly 50 uses in this bottle so it'll last a little under two months. It's not a bad value for what you get considering it's got flouride too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my mouth feeling clean and tastes great! Did you know that the directions for using mouthwash say 1-2 teaspoons? Ya, "teaspoons"! I have always used the full cap as a measurement for mouthwash. Helps to actually read the directions! 😂 This bottle is going to last so much longer now that I am not being wasteful. ugggh I also didn't realize there was an expiration date on mouthwash. Mine expires next August of 2025. It will be long gone by then but just a little info for those who buy in bulk. Little pricey but would still recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan of the taste
reviews.reviewText: This rinse leaves my mouth feeling very clean and fresh and I can tolerate the flavor, but I am not a fan of it. It definitely tastes much better than old-school Listerine, but that flavor still comes through clearly under the mint. That "medicine" flavor largely goes away after I rinse though. My spouse is a long time anticavity rinse user (as per our dentist) but she didn't care for the taste of this one at all. I have no way of knowing whether this is an effective anti-cavity rinse, but I trust the brand so I am comfortable in assuming that it will work as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's Listering which is a good thing
reviews.reviewText: Flavor is good. I have been using this every morning for a while now. It does what it is supposed to and helps protect your teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like this more than the original flavor
reviews.reviewText: This Listerine taste significantly better than their original flavor. My mouth feels cleaner when using this mouth wash. Unsure if its worth the price difference versus the original but it does taste significantly better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My dentist recommended me to use a fluoride mouthwash, so I decided to try this one. It’s got a minty-fresh taste, whitens my teeth a bit, and is the same Listerine brand I know and love. Overall, a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freshens and makes my mouth feel clean.
reviews.reviewText: The first time I used this I had a bad cold and couldn't taste the flavor of anything. However, this stuff is so powerful I could actually taste how minty and strong it was. I had a generic mouth rinse that I was using prior to getting this bottle and this stuff is much stronger and makes my mouth a lot fresher after using. This is a great mouth rinse!
